name: Flying Product to Mini Cart for WooCommerce
author: ido navarro

sections.description: Flying Product to Mini Cart for WooCommerce allows adding beautiful flying animation when the customer adding a product to the cart. This gives a dynamic and improves the usability of your online store. Pay attention: this version of the plugin works only with the Elementor PRO mini cart.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the downloaded zip file and upload the plugin folder into the wp-content/plugins/ directory. Alternatively, upload from Plugins >> Add New >> Upload Plugin.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

short_description: Flying Product to Mini Cart for WooCommerce allow adding beautiful flying animation when the customer adding a product to the cart.
